mapper.update: update oms_cart_item set quantity = quantity + #{quantity}, update_time = now() where cart_item_id = #{cartItemId};
mapper.select: SELECT pss.product_id, pss.sku_stock_id product_sku_id, pss.price, pss.sp_data product_attr, pss.pic product_pic, pp.product_name, pp.pdt_cgy_id FROM pms_sku_stock pss LEFT JOIN pms_product pp ON pss.product_id = pp.product_id WHERE pss.sku_stock_id = #{id};

SELECT cart_item_id, product_id, product_sku_id, user_id, quantity, price, product_sku_code, product_sn, product_attr, create_time, update_time, product_name, product_pic, pdt_cgy_id FROM oms_cart_item WHERE user_id = #{userId};
